titles.title: Glendo Unit of the Missouri River Basin Project Contract Extension Act of 2005
Glendo Unit of the Missouri River Basin Project Contract Extension Act of 2005
Glendo Unit of the Missouri River Basin Project Contract Extension Act of 2005
Glendo Unit of the Missouri River Basin Project Contract Extension Act of 2005
Glendo Unit of the Missouri River Basin Project Contract Extension Act of 2005
A bill to extend the contract for the Glendo Unit of the Missouri River Basin Project in the State of Wyoming.

An act to amend the Irrigation Project Contract Extension Act of 1998 to extend certain contracts between the Bureau of Reclamation and certain irrigation water contractors in the States of Wyoming and Nebraska.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Water and Power. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 109-96.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Domenici without amendment and an amendment to the title. With written report No. 109-167.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 268.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment and an amendment to the Title by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water and Power.
Mr. Renzi moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. 592.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/5/2006--Public Law. Glendo Unit of the Missouri River Basin Project Contract Extension Act of 2005 - Amends the Irrigation Project Contract Extension Act of 1998 to extend each of the water service or repayment contracts identified in the Act for the Glendo Unit of the Missouri River Basin Project, Wyoming, Nebraska, and Colorado, until December 31, 2007.
